summary: Professor Challenger leads an expedition of scientists and adventurers to a remote plateau deep in the Amazonian jungle to verify his claim that dinosaurs still live there.
cast: Michael Rennie|Jill St. John|David Hedison|Claude Rains|Fernando Lamas|Richard Haydn|Ray Stricklyn|Jay Novello|Vitina Marcus|Ian Wolfe|Al Bain|Ross Brown|Colin Campbell|Fred Cavens|Larry Chance|Phyllis Coghlan|Paul Cristo|Alex Denaszody|Anne Dore|Alex Finlayson|Bess Flowers|Peter Fontaine|Don Forbes|John Graham|Sam Harris|Ivo Henderson|George Holmes|Stuart Holmes|Freda Jones|Kenner G. Kemp|Harold Miller|George Pelling|Murray Pollack|Ruggero Romor|Brian Roper|Cosmo Sardo|Owen Song|Jacqueline Squire|Bert Stevens|Gilchrist Stuart|Ben Wright
title: El mundo perdido
